body_html:
Not always batch sampler; here is test_worker_seed:

02:09:55 ======================================================================

02:09:55     idx, batch = self._get_batch()
02:09:55   File "/var/lib/jenkins/pytorch-ci-env/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 309, in _get_batch

02:09:55   File "/var/lib/jenkins/pytorch-ci-env/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 335, in get
02:09:55     res = self._reader.recv_bytes()
02:09:55   File "/var/lib/jenkins/pytorch-ci-env/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 216, in recv_bytes

02:09:55     chunk = read(handle, remaining)
02:09:55   File "/var/lib/jenkins/pytorch-ci-env/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 227, in handler
02:09:55     _error_if_any_worker_fails()

body:
Not always batch sampler; here is `test_worker_seed`:

```
02:09:55 ======================================================================
02:09:55 ERROR: test_worker_seed (__main__.TestDataLoader)
02:09:55 ----------------------------------------------------------------------
02:09:55 Traceback (most recent call last):
02:09:55   File "test_dataloader.py", line 391, in test_worker_seed
02:09:55     for batch in dataloader:
02:09:55   File "/var/lib/jenkins/pytorch-ci-env/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 330, in __next__
02:09:55     idx, batch = self._get_batch()
02:09:55   File "/var/lib/jenkins/pytorch-ci-env/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 309, in _get_batch
02:09:55     return self.data_queue.get()
02:09:55   File "/var/lib/jenkins/pytorch-ci-env/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 335, in get
02:09:55     res = self._reader.recv_bytes()
02:09:55   File "/var/lib/jenkins/pytorch-ci-env/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 216, in recv_bytes
02:09:55     buf = self._recv_bytes(maxlength)
02:09:55   File "/var/lib/jenkins/pytorch-ci-env/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 407, in _recv_bytes
02:09:55     buf = self._recv(4)
02:09:55   File "/var/lib/jenkins/pytorch-ci-env/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 379, in _recv
02:09:55     chunk = read(handle, remaining)
02:09:55   File "/var/lib/jenkins/pytorch-ci-env/miniconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 227, in handler
02:09:55     _error_if_any_worker_fails()
02:09:55 RuntimeError: DataLoader worker (pid 79531) exited unexpectedly with exit code 1. Details are lost due to multiprocessing. Rerunning with num_workers=0 may give better error trace.
02:09:55 
02:09:55 ----------------------------------------------------------------------
02:09:55 Ran 43 tests in 14.603s
```
